name: Classic Vanilla Muffin
description: Vanilla muffins are soft, fluffy, and aromatic baked goods that showcase the classic flavor of vanilla.

name: Rich chocolate Muffin
description: Rich chocolate muffins are decadent treats packed with intense chocolate flavor and a moist, fudgy texture.

name: Almond Joy Muffin
description: Almond muffins are light and flavorful treats that showcase the rich, nutty essence of almonds.

name: Nutty Fusion Muffin
description: Nutty Fusion muffins  are almond, cashew, and raisin muffins that are deliciously nutty and sweet treat that combines the rich flavors of almonds and cashews with the natural sweetness of plump raisins.

name: Vanilla bliss Cupcake
description: Vanilla buttercream cupcakes are classic, fluffy treats topped with a rich and creamy buttercream frosting.

name: Cocoa delight Cupcake
description: Chocolate cupcakes with buttercream frosting are rich, moist treats topped with a smooth and creamy buttercream.

name: Pineapple paradise Cupcake
description: Pineapple buttercream cupcakes are moist, tropical-flavored treats made with pineapple and topped with a smooth, creamy pineapple-infused buttercream frosting.

name: Nutty wonderland Cupcake
description: Nuts cupcakes with buttercream frosting are moist, nutty treats packed with mixed nuts and topped with smooth, creamy buttercream.

name: Coconut crunchies Cookies
description: Coconut cookies are light, crisp treats with a delicate tropical flavor, made from shredded coconut  and ghee for a sweet and satisfying bite.

name: Meltaway butter cookies
description: Butter cookies are rich, tender treats with a smooth, buttery flavor and a crisp, melt-in-your-mouth texture.

name: Rustic Ragi butter cookies
description: Ragi cookies are nutritious, fiber-rich treats made from wholesome finger millet, offering a delicious and healthy snack option.

name: Mini milk cookies
description: Mini milk cookies are soft, bite-sized treats with a creamy, milky flavor.

name: Choco chip cookies
description: Choco chip cookies are soft, buttery delights filled with rich, melty chocolate chips.

name: Fudgy dark chocolate brownie
description: One bite of this brownie, and chocolate heaven is just a taste away.

name: Silky white chocolate brownies
description: A creamy, decadent twist on a classic—white chocolate perfection in every bite.

name: Nuts overloaded brownies
description: A rich, fudgy brownie packed with a crunchy overload of nuts in every bite.

name: Murukku
description: Crispy,crunchy,unforgettable.One of our best selling savoury that spirals your heart.

name: Somas
description: Crispy Delights Wrapped in Sweetness” Enjoy our own signature somas with nuts filling.

name: Thattai
description: Our thattai recipe is just melt in mouth crunchy one.Perfectly puffed !Perfectly spiced!

name: Mixed fruit jam
description: Wholesome fruits, one delightful spread!

name: Tomato ketchup
description: Pure, simple, and delicious—just like it should be!

name: Peanut butter
description: Spread the joy—pure peanut perfection in every bite!
